Vlad was intrigued. A robot? A sentient robot?

Vlad: All right, for now.

He transforms to man mode, leaves his pistols on his hips and sits 
down on a nearby rock.

Vlad: I am new to this planet too. Where do you come from?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ???:
> 
> "I'm a robot" she replied "Don't ask me more 'cause it seems that my 
> memory circuits are damaged; I even can't remember what's my 
name..." 
> she carefully sat down in a rock and with a friendly smile she

> down... why don't we just... chat"
